title: Lost a ranked game due to this

embed.description: WHAT WAS THAT - Clipped by badgamers2000

body: Damn ult bugged the entire game lost two fights early due to it and then was so far behind I couldn't stand with team at all

replies.body:
WTF indeed.

Also, constant 80FPS even while streaming; that must be so nice.
Indeed, love me google fiber boy cheap as hell and they did really good set up in my neighborhood

Riot: Let's give players an exact time when they should time the recast.
*proceeds to do that with a crap load of bugs and nonlogical timing*
Was the last ult before we surrendered but was just clipping this for example

What in the absolute fuck

Rito: ornn players need to have godlike reaction time to hit their ult

SMH nice bugs rito
